entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:54AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT AND ENHANCED SNOWMELT ENDING BY WEDNESDAY... Temperatures will rise once again into the mid 80s or higher on Tuesday, and area rivers and streams will continue to run high due to rapid snowmelt in higher elevations through at least Wednesday. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:39AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WELL ABOVE NORMAL TEMPERATURES FOR EARLY THIS WEEK... Warm weather with well above normal daytime highs will persist through at least Tuesday for Southeast Alaska. Temperatures will rise to highs ranging from the mid 70s over more southerly locations to the mid 80s over northern and central locations and Misty Fjords.

entry.summary: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR APACHE AND NAVAJO COUNTIES WILL EXPIRE AT 330 PM MDT...
